channel.title: Need an Owner/Developer for BountyScapePkz
channel.description:
[B][I]Intro:[/I][/B] BountyScapePkz was a very popular server about 6 months ago. It had almost 500 players at one point and it was running on a Delta base (Explains the fall of the server itself :D). I went on vacation and i had restricted internet access and the server just died. So when i came back i started Misthalin and left BountyScapePkz i cbf to start it again, just too lazy. Therefore i am in need of one or two people to help me rebuild this, or they can rebuild it themselves and be owner.
[B]Requirements:[/B]
[ul][*]Have worked for a server with 100+ players before [*]Have good experience [*]Able to dedicate a lot of time into this [*]Be a leader [*]Java programming skills [*]Creativity [*]Good communication skills [*]Interest and dedication to private servers [*]Understanding how RSPS technology works[/ul]
[B][I]Tasks[/I][/B] Key Duties Include:
[ul][*]Creating new game element ideas (quests, mini-games, skills, etc.) [*]Writing high quality code to run new game content and update existing content [*]Communicating complex creative ideas in a clear and concise manner[/ul]
[B]Features:[/B]
[ul][*]Access to your very own dedicated server (Powerful too) [*]Have your own webhost [*]View and recieve donations[/ul]
****[B]I can GUARANTEE you 100 players, in 1 week after you start the server, if you are selected![/B]
The salary is negotiable, for now i am still disputing whether it should be a fixed rate or a percentage of donations.

item.title: Need an Owner/Developer for BountyScapePkz
item.dc:creator: @Ramster Ramster
item.description:
@Ramster wrote:

Intro:
BountyScapePkz was a very popular server about 6 months ago. It had almost 500 players at one point and it was running on a Delta base (Explains the fall of the server itself :D). I went on vacation and i had restricted internet access and the server just died. So when i came back i started Misthalin and left BountyScapePkz i cbf to start it again, just too lazy. Therefore i am in need of one or two people to help me rebuild this, or they can rebuild it themselves and be owner.

Requirements:

[ul][]Have worked for a server with 100+ players before
[]Have good experience
[]Able to dedicate a lot of time into this
[]Be a leader
[]Java programming skills
[]Creativity
[]Good communication skills
[]Interest and dedication to private servers
[*]Understanding how RSPS technology works[/ul]

Tasks
Key Duties Include:

[ul][]Creating new game element ideas (quests, mini-games, skills, etc.)
[]Writing high quality code to run new game content and update existing content
[*]Communicating complex creative ideas in a clear and concise manner[/ul]

Features:

[ul][]Access to your very own dedicated server (Powerful too)
[]Have your own webhost
[*]View and recieve donations[/ul]

****I can GUARANTEE you 100 players, in 1 week after you start the server, if you are selected!

The salary is negotiable, for now i am still disputing whether it should be a fixed rate or a percentage of donations.
